trends: There have been 25 other sightings in Prescott
There were no other sightings in Prescott on or around April 7th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsFor about four minutes I observed for flashing lights in a gradually changing formation. They appeared as bright as the headlights as an airliner. Each of them flashing intermittantly and staying in a group. There were no other lights such as the flashing lights that aircraft such as airplanes, jets, and helicopters have, only very bright (they appeared as flashing stars). I observed them for about four or five minutes until they were out of sight toward the southwest.
Summary: there were 4 flashing lights in a gradually changing formation moving from the north to the southwest.
